name: Procedural Music Game
description:
How to play:

Tap the Play/Pause Button to begin the game.

This game goes back and forth between the notes being generated and copying the pattern.

 4 counts of generated beats and then 4 counts of copying that.

Click "Tap Here" as the blue icon falls down on the highlighted red square.

 This is a concept that I am looking to expand in the future.
